channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Entire family tumbles into grave during funeral - with man trapped beneath dead dad's coffin
item.description: The dramatic collapse happened just as mourners lowered Benjamin Aviles into his grave following his sudden death - with his son crushed by the casket...

item.title: Boris Johnson Attacked By Ostrich In Hilarious Video Shared By His Wife
item.description: "Cripes! Oh, f***ing hell," the former British prime minister said in a video his wife posted on Instagram.

item.title: Woman paralysed from neck down after weight loss surgery in Turkey
item.description: Danielle Peebles started getting complications from her surgery shortly after she returned from Turkey.

item.title: Man plans to use World War II bomb found in his garden as beer cooler
item.description: The bomb's discovery lead to Ross' street being shut with an explosive ordnance disposal unit ensured the device was safe.

item.title: Student so scared of DIY he paid tradesman £180 to change batteries
item.description: Sam Daley also says he doesn’t want to speak to anyone on the phone and he lacks the confidence to negotiate so sourced the tradesman through an app.

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

item.title: Man claims he was shot by his dog while lying in bed
item.description: The Memphis man was 'relaxing/talking' in bed when the incident occurred
